alert.note: Alert for Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:13PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yellow Medicine County through 300 PM CDT... At 213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Minneota, or 15 miles northwest of Marshall, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarkfield. This includes U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 87 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
